meanings.definition: Diabetologists: specialists in the field of diabetes.

meanings.definition: Diabetologists: those who study and treat diabetes.

meanings.sent3: Why did the diabetologists bring a ruler to the lab? To measure the 'sweet' results!
meanings.sent4: The diabetologists are like guardian angels for those managing diabetes.

meanings.definition: Diabetologists: experts in the management of diabetes.
